Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the game design documents to get familiarized with the game's vision and mechanics.
Research relevant core game mechanics from existing third-person shooter games and outline initial ideas.
Meet with @Lead Game Designer and @Producer to discuss and brainstorm core mechanics that will drive the gameplay experience.
Start defining the core mechanics based on team discussion, focusing on player interactions and environmental impact.
Continue refining core mechanics definition and document any key insights.
Draft an initial outline for prototypes focusing on two key mechanics identified.
Review the day's progress and prepare for prototype creation starting next day.
